i am currently listening to bach.
I just finished helping my student pick out an outfit for a school event.
I started working for myself so I could be more flexible with my time and still be able to take care of my toddler.
currently , i am saving up to get some procedures done.

content.text: I'm going to go skydiving this weekend!
Awesome! I love doing dangerous activities. I'm just about to start working for myself so I can be more flexible with my time.
That's great! I wish I could do that. I work as a teacher so my schedule is pretty much set in stone.
I used to be a teacher. I loved it but it was so hard to find work that had flexible hours. I ended up starting my own flower shop.
That's awesome! How did you start your own flower shop?
I took a bunch of classes and saved up some money. I'm still saving up to get some procedures done.
I'm getting some plastic surgery done. I want to look my best for when I go skydiving.
I'm sure you'll look great! Good luck with your surgery.
